description: This best-selling underwear comes in a Slim Fit and is cut from a breathable, moisture- wicking fabric that’s so soft you won’t want to take them off. Vibe is available in Saxx's widest range of prints, so you can find a pair to suit whatever vibe you’re feeling.
name: Saxx Underwear Vibe Super Soft Boxer Brief, 5" Inseam - Mens
